prompt_template: Solve: {{problem_statement}}. Talk through your approach before coding.
expected_signals_json: ["states approach", "chooses data structures", "mentions complexity", "checks edge cases"]
probe_tree_json: ["What edge cases will you test?", "What is time/space complexity?", "If inputs get 10x, what breaks?"]

prompt_template: Here is code with a failing test. Explain how you would debug it step-by-step.
expected_signals_json: ["forms hypotheses", "adds targeted tests", "finds root cause", "verifies fix"]
probe_tree_json: ["Why start there?", "Show a minimal failing input.", "How prevent regression?"]

prompt_template: Modify this code to meet a new requirement: {{requirement}}. Explain your changes.
probe_tree_json: ["How would you test this?", "Any performance concerns?", "Any alternative approach?"]

prompt_template: Review this snippet as if it’s a PR. What risks or improvements do you see?
probe_tree_json: ["Which change is highest impact?", "Any edge cases?", "How would you test it?"]

prompt_template: Given tables {{schema}}, write SQL to answer: {{question}}. Explain joins and assumptions.
probe_tree_json: ["Why this join type?", "How would you QA results?", "Any edge cases?"]

prompt_template: A key metric dropped by {{percent}}%. What would you investigate first?
probe_tree_json: ["Which segments first?", "What data quality checks?", "What experiment next?"]

prompt_template: You found an insight: {{insight}}. Present it to a non-technical stakeholder in 2 minutes.
probe_tree_json: ["What is the recommendation?", "How confident are you?", "What could be wrong?"]

prompt_template: Tell me about a time you faced {{situation}}. What did you do and what happened?
probe_tree_json: ["What was your role?", "Outcome?", "What would you do differently?"]

probe_tree_json: ["What data do you need?", "What are key drivers?", "What risks to your plan?"]

prompt_template: Metric: {{metric}} moved by {{delta}}. How do you diagnose and respond?
probe_tree_json: ["What would you check first?", "How to validate?", "What tradeoffs?"]

prompt_template: Scenario: {{scenario}}. What would you do in the first 2 weeks?
probe_tree_json: ["What would you NOT do?", "How measure success?", "How handle disagreement?"]
